mapper.select: SELECT RESTAURANT_NO, RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_TEL, RESTAURANT_ADDRESS, RESTAURANT_IMG1, LOCATION_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = R.RESTAURANT_NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE LIKE_FL = 'Y' AND RESTAURANT_NO = R.RESTAURANT_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT, ROUND(NVL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE LIKE_FL = 'Y' AND RESTAURANT_NO = R.RESTAURANT_NO) / NULLIF( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = R.RESTAURANT_NO), 0), 0 ) * 100 )AS "LIKE_PERCENT" FROM RESTAURANT r JOIN LOCATION USING (LOCATION_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE RESTAURANT_DEL_FL = 'N' AND (RESTAURANT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchCode} || '%' OR LOCATION_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchCode} || '%' OR CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchCode} || '%') GROUP BY R.RESTAURANT_NO, RESTAURANT_IMG1,RESTAURANT_ADDRESS,RESTAURANT_TEL,R.RESTAURANT_NAME, LOCATION_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, RESTAURANT_IMG1 ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT DESC
